comment: Thorpe is pretty bad at communication and had a bad attitude in many of our classes. Don't count on getting any emails back. She tells you not to communicate with other students? She gave our entire class the same feedback for a lesson plan, copied and pasted. Lots of busy work. She gives you all the answers for each exam.

TAKE DR. THORPE. she is so passionate about what we are learning which makes it fun. She is such a sweet lady and doesn't care about due dates as long as you turn it in. She is very understanding and is so funny as well. She made the material fun to learn and makes the course very enjoyable.

She has been my favorite professor from this semester. She cares so deeply about the material she is teaching and it definitely rubs off on her students. She is very lenient about attendance and assignments. She does not care when you turn things in just as long as you get it done. It has been amazing having a teacher as chill as her.

Thorpe is my favorite professor this semester. She is passionate about what she teaches about and wants future teachers to be as well. I feel like I have learned a lot in her class and she isn't about busy work, she wants students to succeed and all assignments are beneficial.

I loved this professor. This class is hard, but that is not her fault. As long as you come to class and pay attention, then you will do well. She is caring and gives GREAT advice since she has so much experience with special education. I would take her again.
rating_tags: Tough Grader--Skip class? You won't pass.--Caring
